question: You are working with a product table and want to calculate the average unit price of available items (quantity > 0). The query 'SELECT AVG(total / quantity) FROM product' triggers a 'Division by zero' error. What can you do?
options: SELECT AVG(CASE WHEN quantity = 0 THEN 0 ELSE total / quantity END) FROM product
SELECT AVG(total / quantity) FROM product WHERE quantity IS NOT NULL
